# Overview

## Package installation

The following packages are required to run the code in this workshop:

```{r}
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "tidymodels","here",
                   "glmnet", "ranger", "rpart", "xgboost",
                   "rpart.plot", "vip", "corrr", "GGally",
                   "glue", "patchwork", "doParallel", "rio",
                   "pROC"))

# Hide the many messages and possible warnings from loading all these packages.
suppressMessages(suppressWarnings({ 
  library(tidyverse)
  library(tidymodels)
  library(here)
  library(rio)
  library(vip)
}))

```
